hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) as saying “A woman should not ask for the divorce of her sister to make her bowl vacant for her and to marry him. She will have what is decreed for her.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَرْأَةِ تَسْأَلُ زَوْجَهَا طَلاَقَ امْرَأَةٍ لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Woman Who Asks Her Husband To Divorce Another Wife Of His
